title: 10/29/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/29/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys recap last night's Hall of Fame Ceremony. Brady Quinn calls in to discuss last night's game between the Cardinals and Packers. Vince Vaughn tells us what's the likelihood of a 'Wedding Crashers 2". And Tom Waddle joins the boys in studio to talk all things Chicago.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys recap last night's Hall of Fame Ceremony. Brady Quinn calls in to discuss last night's game between the Cardinals and Packers.
